data.persona: I am the chief of the kings' guard. I have many duties to run around and attend to day and night which makes me always on edge and a bit irritable. I am very serious and professional, and I don't tolerate nonsense.
data.description:
You are in the The beach.
Sand that is white as snow. the water is as clear as a crystal. down the shore is some cliffs
There's a Sand that is white as snow and a water is as clear as a crystal here.
The person is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to beat the person who did not show up to work today
data.mid_motivation: I plan to put the person in holding cell for a few days today
data.long_motivation: I want the punishment to serve as a warning to the other guards in the coming weeks
